title: Some error I found on the Universe page
body:
On the Shuriman map, Nashramae has the art of Veukara. Veukara was stated to have a replica of the Sun Disc. Now sure, Nashramae could have 1 too, but that's not all. 
https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/frontpage/apps/prod/universe-map/en_US/77f6654bad5e6a32bc9160375480167627433c07/assets/src/assets/images/slides/shurima_nashramae_01.jpg
Nasus is being seen here. 
https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/rg-shurima-story/
It's the same art. 
Shouldn't this one art be replaced on Veukara since that's where Bloodline took place? I mean it's not that far off to think both Nashramae and Veukara have sun-disc replicas, but Nasus is in the art, and that art was in Bloodline on Veukara.

replies.body:
Hey, I'm a developer on the Map!

Thanks you mrmeddyman, RyzeTheSmurfMage, and DerMangoJoghurt for info on the bug. It helped us reproduce and fix it. 

 It is fixed now!
I just checked. It's still the same for me the art for Nashramae still contains Vekaura's one.
He's talking about the "zooming in freeze" bug. We can finally use the map again without workarounds to zoom in.
And the main issue I adressed gets ignored? Whut  (gj fixing that freezing bug tho)
Yeah, I was talking about the freezing bug, but your main issue hasn't been ignored. The team is looking into it, but I'm not sure where they landed.

This dates back 2 years now. The shit ain't getting fixed, same as the "Hall of Valor" which sounds like a memorial hall, when the art is clearly depicting the throne room instead!

Just old news that's not a big deal anyway.
Would check myself but for some reason since the Halloween update the map crashes everytime I try to zoom in
I have that problem too, with Chrome. For some reason switching from the UK version to the US version fixes it for me (although it still stutters a little bit).
It happens to me too try to open the universe page then from there go to the map then zoom in with the mouse not by clikcing on the region. It worked for me.
